name: Wood Solitaire
description:
An entertaining variant of the Classic Solitaire.
Features includes:
- Universal App
- Easy drag and drop;
- Double tap automove;
- Auto fill card to foundation piles;
- Portrait and landscape mode;
- Easy to read card sets;
- Three Levels
- Gamecenter leaderboards:
-- Games played
-- Games won for each level;
-- Cumulative time played and games won;
